purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 坝)
Pictophonetic: 霸 indicates the sound; 土 (earth) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 土 [ tǔ ] soil, earth; items made of earth
    • 霸 [ bà ] tyrant; to usurp, to rule by might
heisig_chinese_memo: The tyrant builds a dam stopping the neighboring kingdom from receiving any water thus drying out their soil and starving them.

bà: (сущ) (диал.) песчаный пляж, песчаная отмель
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The soil is where the dam starts and the shellfish and river stop.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " water " to " ba " sound. The original meaning is a building that intercepts water flow. "Ji Yun. "Rhyme": "Dam, weir." "Words. "Tube": "Dam, barrier water weir." Such as the Northern Song Dynasty Shan E "Wuzhong Water Resources Book. "Wuyan Water Conservancy": "The river is more than sixteen miles from Xiba to Dongba." Wei Yuan in the Qing Dynasty "Records of poems and essays in the stone house in the heart of Yushu Yinxin": "Change the road of hundreds of dams in Huaibei and more than forty states and counties. The official fees, and discuss four rushes."

" Dam " also refers to water conservancy structures that protect the dikes. For example, in the Qing Dynasty Wang Shizhen's "Guanglu Governor's River Road Jin Gong Epitaph": "Also, please set up two dams on the bank of the river, so that the skyrocketing increase will decrease, and the embankment will not be damaged." There are also spurs and dams.
humanum_short_description_en: From " water " to " ba " sound. The original meaning is a building that intercepts water flow.
humanum_full_description:
從「水」，「霸」聲。本義是攔截水流的建築物。《集韻．禡韻》：「壩，堰也。」《字彙．土部》：「壩，障水堰也。」如北宋單鍔《吳中水利書．伍堰水利》：「其河自西壩至東壩十六里有餘。」清代魏源〈御書印心石屋詩文錄敘〉：「改淮北數百摃壩之道及四十餘州、縣之官費，而議四譁。」

　　「壩」也指保護堤防的水利建築。如清代王士禛〈光祿大總督河道靳公墓誌銘〉：「又疏請河之岸設減兩水壩，使暴漲隨減，不至傷堤。」又如丁壩、壩埽等。
humanum_short_description: 從「水」，「霸」聲。本義是攔截水流的建築物。

從「 水 」，「 霸 」聲。本義是攔截水流的建築物。《集韻．禡韻》：「壩，堰也。」《字彙．土部》：「壩，障水堰也。」如北宋單鍔《吳中水利書．伍堰水利》：「其河自西壩至東壩十六里有餘。」清代魏源〈御書印心石屋詩文錄敘〉：「改淮北數百摃壩之道及四十餘州、縣之官費，而議四譁。」 「 壩 」也指保護堤防的水利建築。如清代王士禛〈光祿大總督河道靳公墓誌銘〉：「又疏請河之岸設減兩水壩，使暴漲隨減，不至傷堤。」又如丁壩、壩埽等。
From " water" to " ba" sound. The original meaning is a building that intercepts water flow. "Ji Yun. "Rhyme": "Dam, weir." "Words. "Tube": "Dam, barrier water weir." Such as the Northern Song Dynasty Shan E "Wuzhong Water Resources Book. "Wuyan Water Conservancy": "The river is more than sixteen miles from Xiba to Dongba." Wei Yuan in the Qing Dynasty "Records of poems and essays in the stone house in the heart of Yushu Yinxin": "Change the road of hundreds of dams in Huaibei and more than forty states and counties. The official fees, and discuss four rushes." " Dam" also refers to water conservancy structures that protect the dikes. For example, in the Qing Dynasty Wang Shizhen's "Guanglu Governor's River Road Jin Gong Epitaph": "Also, please set up two dams on the bank of the river, so that the skyrocketing increase will decrease, and the embankment will not be damaged." There are also spurs and dams.

壩字的基本解释

壩
bà
见“坝”。

壩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bà］
［《集韻》必駕切，去禡，幫。］
“坝1”的繁体字。
(1)拦截水流的建筑物，用以抬高水位、积蓄水量、修建水库以及造田等。
(2)堤岸。参见“壩田”。
(3)坝子；平地。
(4)建筑在水中近岸的地方，以引导水流、保护堤岸的水工建筑物。
(5)方言。沙滩；沙洲。
(6)通“耙”。

壩字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　壩； 康熙笔画：24； 页码：页242第33
【集韻】必駕切，音霸。堰也。

壩字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
壩字的起名意思

暂无。

dam
Basic explanation of words
dam
bà
See "dam".
dam
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bà］
["Ji Yun" must be cut, go to the 禡, help. ]
The traditional characters of "dam1".
(1) Buildings that intercept water flow are used to raise water levels, store water, build reservoirs, and cultivate land.
(2) Embankment. See "Batian".
(3) Dam; flat ground.
(4) The building is located near the shore in the water to guide the flow of water and protect the hydraulic structures on the embankment.
(5) Dialects. Beach; sandbar.
(6) Through "rake".
